016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.defaults;
017
018import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.ApplicationConfigurator;
019import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.RequestConfigurator;
020import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.ApplicationConfigDecorator;
021import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.RequestConfigDecorator;
022
023import java.util.Collection;
024import java.util.Locale;
025
026import static de.cuioss.tools.collect.CollectionLiterals.immutableSet;
027
028/**
029 * Provides some default configuration for the tests. The defaults are:
030 * <ul>
031 * <li>Setting the supported locales to {@link Locale#ENGLISH} and
032 * {@link Locale#GERMANY}</li>
033 * <li>Setting the default locale to {@link Locale#ENGLISH}</li>
034 * <li>Setting the user-agent to {@value #FIREFOX}</li>
035 * </ul>
036 *
037 * @author Oliver Wolff
038 */
039public class BasicApplicationConfiguration implements ApplicationConfigurator, RequestConfigurator {
040
041    /**
042     * Firefox user-agent
043     */
044    public static final String FIREFOX = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0";
045
046    /**
047     * User-agent identifier.
048     */
049    public static final String USER_AGENT = "user-agent";
050
051    /**
052     * The supported {@link Locale}s
053     */
054    @SuppressWarnings("java:S2386") // owolff: false positive -> immutableSet
055    public static final Collection<Locale> SUPPORTED_LOCALES = immutableSet(Locale.ENGLISH, Locale.GERMANY,
056        Locale.FRENCH);
057
058    /**
059     * The default {@link Locale}
060     */
061    public static final Locale DEFAULT_LOCALE = Locale.ENGLISH;
062
063    @Override
064    public void configureApplication(final ApplicationConfigDecorator config) {
065        config.registerSupportedLocales(SUPPORTED_LOCALES).registerDefaultLocale(DEFAULT_LOCALE).setContextPath(""); // default
066        // context
067        // path
068        // for myfaces test is
069        // 'null'
070    }
071
072    @Override
073    public void configureRequest(final RequestConfigDecorator decorator) {
074        decorator.setRequestHeader(USER_AGENT, FIREFOX)
075            .setRequestLocale(SUPPORTED_LOCALES.toArray(new Locale[SUPPORTED_LOCALES.size()]));
076    }
077}
